body_html:
I can not reproduce on Ubuntu 14.04. I installed python3-protobuf with pip3 in a virtualenv, than used the corresponding python3 in the virtualenv when installing TensorFlow. It built fine.

Can you post the input/output when you run ./configure? Also, try without sudo after doing a bazel clean, there is no need to use sudo when building.
body_text:

body:
I can not reproduce on Ubuntu 14.04. I installed python3-protobuf with pip3 in a virtualenv, than used the corresponding python3 in the virtualenv when installing TensorFlow. It built fine.

Can you post the input/output when you run `./configure`? Also, try without sudo after doing a `bazel clean`, there is no need to use sudo when building.
